scripts.build: yarn run build:contracts && yarn run build:tsc
scripts.build:tsc: rimraf -rf ./dist && yarn build:contract-dts && yarn build:fix-contract-dts && yarn build:copy-contract-dts && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:fix-contract-dts: grep -rl 'extends ethers.utils.Interface' src/contracts | xargs sed -i 's/ethers\.utils\.Interface/Interface/g' && grep -rl 'Result ' src/contracts | xargs sed -i 's/Result /Result, Interface /g'
scripts.flatten: yarn run flatten:airnode && yarn run flatten:delete-license-lines
scripts.flatten:airnode: hardhat flatten contracts/AirnodeRrp.sol > AirnodeRrp.flat.sol && yarn run flatten:delete-license-lines
